about_the_game:
Classic Arcade, 2D, Puzzle and Mazed, pixel art. Easy to Play, Hard to Complete.
Puzzlemazed is one genuine medieval challenge.

The ancient lands of Atlas, dominated by three kingdoms.
Humans coexisted with the Titans in perfect harmony,
when strange events occurred throughout the territory.
It seemed like the work of magicians and their spells, but the inhabitants of the kingdoms blamed the Titans.
Strange behaviors appeared in creatures everywhere,
To this day it is not known what causes it. Many animals lost their orientation and became aggressive.
For this reason, they were captured and locked in labyrinths so that they could not escape.
Along with the Titans, who were exiled and chained,
thus preventing them from being a threat to the inhabitants again.
The Kings of each Kingdom forged three keys for each door of the labyrinths.
The chains of the Titans were closed with three padlocks, one for each Kingdom.
But they had a detail of confidence for a possible redemption.
They would leave the last door of the Titans open,
in case some brave hero ever found the cause of everything that happened and,
By escaping the dangers of the labyrinths, he would be able to unleash the Titans.
With an extreme condition, he would only have one chance.

This is the story of PUZZLEMAZED, a warrior who can be you, the redeemer.
